Montagskonzert – Wave Fields

2023-02-27concertconcerts

Concert curated by Christine Chapman with the Wave Field Synthesis System of The Game of Life Foundation, The Hague.

Mon. 27.02.2023 8:00 pm Admission free ical

Cologne, Studio of Ensemble Musikfabrik

Rolf Wallin – Prillar for WFS Array (2023) new version for the WFS system for two Norwegian lurs and live electronics

Elena Rykova – Whispering to the stars (2022) new version for the WFS system for horn, trumpet, tuba and electronics

Ji Youn Kang – new composition (2023) for the WFS system

Karlheinz Stockhausen – Siebzehnte Stunde aus KLANG: NEBADON (2007) for horn and electronic music

Concert with the Wave Field Synthesis System of The Game of Life Foundation, The Hague

Christine Chapman, horn, lur and curator Marco Blaauw, lur Maxime Morel, tuba
